original_title: Click, Clack, Moo: Christmas at the Farm
overview: It's Christmas time and the farm animals have a problem: how to buy Farmer Brown the present of his dreams - a Tumbletron 300 clothes dryer. It's a race against time for them, and for Duck who has his own problem - upping his "nice" numbers for Santa to get off the "naughty" list.
tagline: Itâ€™s Christmas Time at the Farm!
title: Click, Clack, Moo: Christmas at the Farm
